data.name: RESEARCH and DESTROY - Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
Take on the horde of Supernaturals in style with this Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward costume pack.

Contains the following costumes:
- Sigma Klim costume for Larry
- Phi costume for Marie
- Zero III costume for Gary
data.about_the_game:
Take on the horde of Supernaturals in style with this Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward costume pack.

Contains the following costumes:

data.short_description: Take on the horde of Supernaturals in style with this Zero Escape: Virtue's Last Reward costume pack.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4771 CPU @ 3.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 4GB
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
